title: Torment for Tiffany
description: Tiffany's sister Lucinda is trapped, literally. Tiffany, a secret masochist, has fantasised for years about being held as her sister was, so when her chance comes, she takes it. She persuades the breeder. Moore, to put her into the frame alongside her sister, with the added provison that she is dealt with by a dominatrix. What she doesn't forsee is that her other sister, Beatrice, will delight in being her tormentor. Tiffany's torment has only just begun...
author: Bruce Mclachlan
